fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Mastery: Whenever you do not attack 2 phases in a row, you satchel a random card.
- Mindful: Whenever you play 1 or less cards in a phase, Heal! yourself at the end of the phase.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Judgment: Pick a target. If they do not win with you, prevent them from drawing. Influenceable. [1 use, Unique]
- Trinity: Make a card in your hand Upgraded, Reforged, and Satcheled. It cannot be traded. You may only play 1 card the next phase. [1 use, Unique, UOR3]
- Divination: Pick a target. You will learn how many attacking cards they played at the end of the phase. [2 uses, 2 CD]
